thread.title: Amazing stay in paris
thread.title_full: Amazing stay in paris - Review of Hotel Monge, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: ladystardust123
title: Amazing stay in paris
text: Me and my husband were in Paris for 4 night stay . We LOVED the hotel. Everything was perfect, every little detail, from the room new and so clean , the comfortable bed, the great shower with the great soaps, service was always nice and so helpful in any hour and time , so personal and feels like home. We really liked the honesty bar with the coffee/tea/water and cookies around the clock, the great breakfast, and you have to try the hamam , you need to pre-order it and it was so amazing . Thank you hotel monge! We will come back for sure!!!
